item.description:
July 4- SUNDAY INDEPENDENCE DAY

SPECTACULAR SINGLES DAY
PARTY
WITH
THE IRA!!

MARK YOU CALENDAR FOR

July 4 –Sunday 2:00PM-?

WHERE: The Fun House of “The Ira”
44 Dibble Hollow Lane, Windsor Locks 06096
Outdoor Event ONLY- Rain sadly postpones Party

PLAY TIME:
Personal introduction to each and ever person. Of course, name tags for all……..Plus, Ping Pong, Air Hockey Badminton, Bocce, Washer Toss, Foozball, Mancala, Frisbee, Kadima, Crockett, and a few more surprises. ( See: http://www.meetup.com...)

YOU BRING: A fun loving attitude and a infectious smile. Dress Code is very relaxed. (Volunteers the day of the party in the morning appreciated, if you can)

FUN PARTY DETAILS:

1. FOOD: Please bring a creative appetizer or dessert to impress other. A serving spoon if needed. (Please no Ritz crackers and a can of Wiz Cheese)

Dinner will include:
• Boneless Marinated Chicken
• Ira’s Pasta Creation: Angel Hair with summer vegtables,garlic,ginger,capers, with assorted tantalizing spices.
• Homemade Garlic Bread

(We start our diets on Tuesday)

LIBATION INFO: BYOB and perhaps a little to share.

PARKING: 1. Please Park first in designated Visitor areas. 2. I will send out more info to those that are attending about parking down the street in a commuter parking lot and taking one car to my home. More details to be provided. (The goal is to be sure my neighbors talk to me after the party-you get the idea)

RSVP: On or before-Thursday, July 1, 8:00PM.
Ira 860-604-5792.Mistrchrming@aol.com. Subject Line: July 4th Party

Please Note: Singles Only, Sorry No Couples. Limited to 50 Singles. I will do my best to have an equal number of man and women present. Come alone, but, never feel alone!!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: The Ira- Spectacular July 4th Singles Day Party!!
